name: Town Zombie Attack: Last Hero
description:
Town Zombie Attack: Last Hero is high addictative game. Take part in the great battle to rescue humanity and find out what's happening! You are a trained zombie killer! Use all your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of enemy zombies and avenge other fallen heroes. Get ready to utilize stockpiles of powerful weapons, supercharge them with Zombies trying to destroy the city, and zombie anarchy has taken over.
- Thrilling and breathtaking zombies animations
- Realistic sounds and zombies attack animations.
- Scary and Intense Zombie dogs attack
- Survive the Undead Horde Apocalypse
